name: Bullet Pico
description:
Bullet is still in development. It's maybe 80% of the way there, but some elements such as sound, interface, and custom content are likely to change.

The current version is still fully playable.

----

In this tense, fast-paced puzzle game, players take on the role of heroines who settle their disputes with each other through excessive firepower! Use your actions to form patterns, clear your sight, and assault the opponent! Keep up dealing with the curtain of bullets coming at you each round and be the last heroine standing to win! Rules
  • Each round, you will face an increasing amount of bullets. Depending on their color and number, they will be placed on your board. If it does not fit, it will instead hit and damage your heroine.
  • You cannot advance to the next round until all bullets are taken.
  • In order to clear bullets, you must match the requirements and clears denoted by your patterns, which are located in the bottom-center of your screen: If you meet all the patterns requirements, you clear all bullets on * spaces, and get that many points!
  • You have seven action points, which are refreshed between rounds. You can use them to move bullets around, or draw new patterns, or activate other actions, which are specific to different character! The action sidebar is the right side of the screen.
  • Each heroine has a unique special ability, a unique set of patterns, and a unique set of actions to make them all play differently!
  • For a comprehensive explanation of rules, watch the publisher's official video or search for the rules PDF online,
Modes
  • CLASSIC MODE - Play with the original rules, and a strict 3-minute time limit!
  • CAREFREE MODE - Play at your own pace with no timer
  • CEASELESS MODE - A unique, endless experience only in the PIco version! Every five seconds, you gain an action, but a bullet drops.
Characters
  • Efsir Volka - With her strong sense of duty and burning wish to protect the planet, Esfire is often hotheaded, but her heart is always in the right place.
  • Rie Akagi - A short-tempered girl with plans to bring the Yakuza back to its former glory
  • Senka Kasun - A professional hitman. Undulges in vices as a way to pass the present and forget about the past.
  • Ekolu Kapakahi - Leader of a triangle-based cult. Strives to become closer to divinity via triangles.
  • Pusha Mozza Rella - Pusha's telekinteic powers allow her to excel at retro gaming. She loves puzzle games of all types, from Sokoban to Tetris.
Controls

MOUSE CONTROLS (Recommended)

  • Hover over patterns and actions to select
  • Left-click to acivate actions
  • Right-click to cancel actions
  • Enter to pause/see options
  • Shortcut: You can click on empty spaces to draw a new bullet, and click on occupied spaces to use your move action. (This can be disabled in options)

KEYBOARD/GAMEPAD CONTROLS

  • Use arrow keys or dpad to move cursor around
  • Z key or A button to activate actions
  • X key or B button to cancel actions
  • Enter or select to pause/see options
  • Shortcut: You can activate on empty spaces to draw a bullet, or on occupied spaces to use your move action. (This can be disabled in options)
